title: Away From Pomp of Olympics, Homeless Shiver on Streets of Milan
summary_full: Six homeless people have died in the Italian city in recent weeks, highlighting the widening inequality as the Games unfold there.
summary_public: Six homeless people have died in the Italian city in recent weeks, highlighting the widening inequality as the Games unfold there.
